Loyal Unto Death.name: Loyal Unto Death
Loyal Unto Death.flavor: In a flash of light, you and a nearby ally vanish, reappearing only after you have switched positions.
Loyal Unto Death.effect: Before the attack, you and an ally within 10 squares of you swap places, teleporting into each otherâ€™s space. Each enemy adjacent to you grants combat advantage to you, and each enemy adjacent to the ally grants combat advantage to him or her until the end of your next turn.

Ever-Present Escort.name: Ever-Present Escort
Ever-Present Escort.flavor: You extend the invisible field of protection granted by your swordmage warding to a nearby ally.
Ever-Present Escort.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by an attack that targets AC
Ever-Present Escort.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Ever-Present Escort.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the target. The target gains a +4 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Elemental Scourge.name: Elemental Scourge
Elemental Scourge.flavor: You draw forth a burst of energy from the Elemental Chaos, scouring your enemies while allowing your allies to retreat to safety.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Teleportation, Thunder
Elemental Scourge.onHit: 4d8 + Constitution modifier cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage. The attack ignores any resistance to these damage types.
Elemental Scourge.effect: Each ally in the burst can teleport 3 squares.
